desc: Comfy & sustainable women's underwear designed to support you & the planet. Pantee is a sustainable underwear brand in the UK that promises next level comfort with a stylish range of comfy underwear sets. Shop Pantee today to discover next level comfort!

layout.text: SUPPORTING YOU AND THE PLANET FROM TOP TO BOTTOM
Call off the search for high-quality non-sheer tank tops! Made from double-lined deadstock cotton, our Tank tops are taking your summer by storm.
